item.title: Tim Tebow seen working out on a USC baseball field
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Tim Tebow was observed working out on a USC baseball field recently. Tebow’s throwing motion looks a little bit better but his agents are likely pressuring him to become a public speaker according to Only Gators
